definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: It also had the ventral gondola under the nose, from which a gunner could fire rearwards .
sentences.chinese: 它还腹侧敞车下鼻子，从其中一名炮手可大火在后面。

sentences.english: There are some cannoneers nearly as noisy as their own guns.
sentences.chinese: 有些炮手的嗓门几乎跟他们的大炮一样响。

sentences.english: For many of the wrestlers I changed heads using the Preiser model figure Adam set.
sentences.chinese: 我使用贝尔瑟模型人偶亚当套件改变许多炮手的头脸。

sentences.english: When the breech was closed and all was ready, the gunner yanked the lanyard.
sentences.chinese: 大炮后膛门关上后，一切准备就绪，炮手拉动引火绳。

sentences.english: The rest four gunners are responsible of carrying rounds.
sentences.chinese: 剩余四名炮手负责携带弹药。

sentences.english: An additional exterior gunner controls the projectile cannon.
sentences.chinese: 榴弹炮由一名额外的舱外炮手控制。

sentences.english: The gunner with this perk has a 5% better chance to inflict a critical.
sentences.chinese: 拥有此特长的炮手提高5%的暴击率。

sentences.english: He is a gunner of the British navy.
sentences.chinese: 他是英国海军的一名炮手。

sentences.english: Five men in a twin-forty mount had been hit.
sentences.chinese: 双管四十毫米火炮装置上的五名炮手被打中了。

sentences.english: And artillery-men, the deadliest that ever fired gun.
sentences.chinese: 还有炮手，那些百发百中的神枪手。

sentences.english: How many gunners did you have during the war?
sentences.chinese: 战争期间你一共有过多少位炮手？

sentences.english: The gunner from 1st gun can now see the cupola in his sight.
sentences.chinese: 第1门炮的炮手在瞄准镜里看到了坦克指挥塔。

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
